Text: You once uploaded The Good Witch. Would you happen to have access to the next two?

Hey Greenbud,  you mentioned on the Deer Hunter torrent to ask for requests. I have an obscure one but it's worth a shot, They All Laughed (1981) starring Ben Gazzara, Audrey Hepburn, John Ritter, with Dorothy Stratten (her only film). If you have this I would so greatly appreciate it and return the favor if I can. Email me at audiophilehead@hotmail.com if you will.

Peace,
Audiohead22

ps - thank you very much for all the great up's brother!  :)

Hi there @greenbud1969, first of, let me tell you that i really appreciate your work. N since you are generous enough to take requests, I would be very grateful if you could upload the classic 1983 Oshin series if you have it. Thanks
